data.title: bd-2hu: Handle old_count=0 pure-addition hunks in drift calculation
data.description: When old_count=0 (pure-addition hunk), hunk_old_end was computed as old_start instead of old_start-1, causing incorrect line shifting. Fix: conditional hunk_old_end computation. 6 new tests added.

data.reason: LGTM. No security concerns. The fix correctly handles old_count=0 pure-addition hunks using saturating_sub for safe u32 arithmetic. No injection vectors, no path traversal, no unbounded resource consumption. Integer overflow is not practical since values come from jj diff output bounded by file sizes.
